Question: Ningbo Sunhon International Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ningbo Sunhon International Co., Ltd.

Electric Scooters

- Eagle S6: 11-inch tire, 48V/60V, 15ah-23ah
- S9plus: 10-inch tire, 48V, 10-20ah
- S9: 10-inch tire, 48V, 10-15ah
- Pigeon S8: 10-inch tire, 36V/48V, 10-15ah

Electric Bicycles

- EB13 Fat Tire E Bike: 20*4 inch tire, 48V 10ah-14ah, built-in battery
- EB18 City E Bike: 16-20inch tire, 48V 12ah, magnesium alloy frame
- EB10 Fat Tire E Bike: 20-4 inch tire, 48V 10-20ah, external battery, foldable
- EB16 Mountain E Bike: 26*1.95 inch tire, 48V 10ah, external battery, aluminum alloy frame

Features

- Quality assured products with DriveTron Brand
- Instant response to inquiries
- Strict quality control and certifications such as CE, RoHS, EN17128, MSDS, UN38.3
- Customization with low MOQ requirement
- Short lead time for customers

Location: Ningbo, Zhejiang
Business Type: Manufacturer, Trade Company
Summary_cn:
宁波孙鸿国际有限公司。

电动滑板车

- 鹰 S6：11英寸轮胎，48V / 60V，15ah-23ah
- S9plus：10英寸轮胎，48V，10-20ah
- S9：10英寸轮胎，48V，10-15ah
- 鸽子 S8：10英寸轮胎，36V / 48V，10-15ah

电动自行车

- EB13胖轮胎电动自行车：20*4英寸轮胎，48V 10ah-14ah，内置电池
- EB18城市电动自行车：16-20英寸轮胎，48V 12ah，镁合金车架
- EB10胖轮胎电动自行车：20-4英寸轮胎，48V 10-20ah，外置电池，可折叠
- EB16山地电动自行车：26*1.95英寸轮胎，48V 10ah，外置电池，铝合金车架

产品特点

- 品质有保障，具有DriveTron品牌
- 对咨询的即时回应
- 严格的质量控制和获得CE、RoHS、EN17128、MSDS、UN38.3等认证
- 可以根据需求进行定制，最低起订量要求低
- 对客户交货时间短

地点：浙江宁波
经营类型：制造商、贸易公司
